de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.debugging.tasks

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractTask
      • org.gradle.api.DefaultTask
        • de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.debugging.tasks.Debug
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>, org.gradle.api.internal.DynamicObjectAware, org.gradle.api.internal.TaskInternal, ExtensionAware, Task, org.gradle.util.Configurable<Task>

    public class Debug
extends DefaultTask
    Applies debug settings to a target task (that implements JavaForkOptions) on execution

    Using a task with this type enables conditional debugging based on task execution. Executing only the target task will not activate debugging. Only calling a Debug task will add the debug specific JVM arguments to the target task. For each target task, the last associated Debug task executed will overwrite all others.
